values:
" Check your mail, climb your ladder
 Count the pieces you've managed to gather
 Does it matter? What are you trying to achieve?
 Let go of your throat if you're dying to breathe "

Day after day, love turns grey
Like the skin of a dying man
Night after night, we pretend its all right
But I have grown older and
You have grown colder and
Nothing is very much fun any more
And I can feel one of my turns coming on
I feel you cold as a razor blade
Tight as a tourniquet
Dry as a funeral drum

Run to the bedroom
Next to the suitcase on the left
You'll find my favorite ex
Don't look so frightened
This is just a passing phase
One of my bad days
Would you like to watch T.V.
Or get between the sheets
Or contemplate the silent freeway
Would you like something to eat
Would you like to learn to fly
Would'ya
Would you like to see me try

WOULD YOU LIKE TO CALL THE COPS?
DO YOU THINK ITS TIME I STOPPED?
Why are you running away

Sometimes, I feel the fear of uncertainty stinging clear
And I can't help but ask myself how much
I'll let the fear take the wheel and steer.
It's driven me before, and it seems to have a vague,
haunting mass appeal.
But lately I'm beginning to find that I
should be the one behind the wheel.

Whatever tomorrow brings,
I'll be there with open arms and open eyes,
Whatever tomorrow brings, I'll be there..I'll be there.

So, if I decide to waiver my chance to be one of the hive
Will I choose water over wine and hold my own and drive?


It's driven me before and it seems to be the way
that everyone else gets around.
But lately I'm beginning to find that when
I drive myself my light is found.

Whatever tomorrow brings,
I'll be there with open arms and open eyes, 
Whatever tomorrow brings, I'll be there...I'll be there.

What if all the world I used to know
Was just an elaborate dream?

There you are my precious
              My long ago
Hiding behind the shadows
      of your broken soul
Why is it always
You want something you can never have?

If you should go skating
On the thin ice of modern life
Dragging behind you the silent reproach
Of a million tear-stained eyes
Don't be surprised when a crack in the ice
Appears under your feet.
You slip out of your depth and out of your mind
With your fear flowing out behind you
As you claw the thin ice.

it seems like you're a bit confused.
you say you are too weak to leave me. but aren't you the runner?

was My thin-worn spirit too real for your self-dictated reality?
was it too much facing the consequences from our past?

I reflect on the past with a sense of pending resolution. I'm tired and sore...getting back up will hurt, but im not afraid to bleed a little to get out of this hole.
I accept that limping up that mountain is the only thing that keeps me from fallin back to where I was .
You see the past as something overwhelmingly impossible. The only way you proceeded was by ignoring it. Every time something reminded you , it pulled you back down and stared you in the face.
You are too scared to try again. "its not the same..." We are still in the shadow of our past.
Too hard to ignore. I asked you, "So does that mean you give up on me?" and you nodded. You left me when you concluded that you can't deal with the aftermath of our mistakes.

Can you see her?
She spends her whole day in a theater
Livin her time in the life that she would prefer
And she stirs nothing, comes and goes she wishes
Surroundings oblivious to her whole existence
But if they only knew
About the thoughts that she can't seem to stop from comin through
Comin' across
At a loss for dialouge
Walkin through the fog
With her eyes closed & her mind gone

And someday, oneday, when the credits roll
She'll hold a pocket full of gunplay for the ignorant souls
Then we'll know  what depth awake touches sleep
Make me walk the thin line between shallow and deep

Disarm you with a smile
And cut you like you want me to
Cut that little child
Inside of me and such a part of you
Ooh, the years burn 

I used to be a little boy
So old in my shoes
And what i choose is my choice
What's a boy supposed to do?
The killer in me is the killer in you
My love
I send this smile over to you

Disarm you with a smile
And leave you like they left me here
To wither in denial
The bitterness of one who's left alone
Ooh, the years burn
im back! now all i need is a car, liscence, job, cellphone, and a home!

"You tell lies thinking I can't see 
You can't cry 'cause you're laughing at me 
I'm down, I'm down, I''m down 
How can you laugh when you know I'm down 
How can you laugh when you know I'm down 

Man buys ring, woman throws it away 
Same old thing happen every day 
I'm down, I'm down, I''m down 
How can you laugh when you know I'm down 
How can you laugh when you know I'm down 

We're all alone and there's nobody else 
She'll still moan Keep your hands to yourself 
I'm down, I'm down, I''m down 
How can you laugh when you know I'm down 
How can you laugh when you know I'm down, woo 

A baby you know I'm down 
I guess I'm down 
I'm down on the ground 
I'm down 
Ah, baby I'm upside down "

I'm coming to believe 
When somebody has nothing more to give
Their true friends are distinguishable from the rest


Today I walk alone
I can see for miles and miles........

I wouldn't be able to do it to you.

For how emotionally oriented your mind is.... How can you?

Please! 

events are contradicting your words, yet never the less are consistent:

Don't let me see clearly.

Cuz in reality... the earth sucks.

I could stand here waiting 
a fool for another day
I dont suppose its worth 
the price I would pay

But I'm thinking it over anyway

I got greed, it's got me I got freeze, it's on me I can't breathe, I can't see I just bleed, I just be You walk away from me My soul leaves, my soul breathes My heart aches, the ground shakes You can't beat it, you can't feed it You walk away from me Take me to the place I love......

"Trust in me, can't trust
I know, I don't believe it
All my life so scarred
What for, who? you can't conceive it
Everything you fear
I'll be, you couldn't live it
I whisper in your ear
So loud, why can't you hear it?"

<font color="#FFFFFF">feelings we keep away from decay
feelings we send each other everyday
does your silence speak the word I hear
does your reserve mean what I fear
the forever we are is the forever we murdered
stay right here, stand by me
<font color="black">
________________________________________________________

Being judged sucks, especially when the prosecutor has no idea whats going on.

Ignorance is the root of all conflict (natural resources too, maybe.)


I'm only human.

well, i learned how to drive stardard transmission... made it back from city hall and only stalled 3 times XD

My dad seems to think this cars a good deal, and i was already sold on it a month ago.. so yea.  maybe even by tomorrow i'll have my own mustang =D

well, im off to test drive the mustang. if my "sponsor" doesnt think its too shitty, it'll be mine in a couple days.


or not... I just called scott and I guess he will drive it over here.

I just hope he's a good of a salesman as he thinks he is, because I would much rather be driving a mustang than some 20 year old "ricer".

not to mention this mustang already has $1500 worth of "essential" stereo equipment.

"Nature does not cast pearls before swine. there is just as much beauity visible to us in the landscape aswe are prepared to apreciate, -- not a grain more. the actual objects one person will see from a particulat hilltop are just as different from those which another will see as the persons are different. the scarlet oak must, in a sense, be in your eye when you go forth. we cannot see anything until we are possesed with the idea of it, and then we can hardly see anything else."

All you need to control the world is self control...  One can only be discontent if they so choose.

Okay, that is easily said. 

Many are the times which I realize this, only to find myself again, at a later time, wondering why I allow the things which I don't have to consume my thoughts.
Yep, it wouldn't let me post without a journal... which would be cool cuz I could say strange things and people would be like wow, he doesn't exist.
im dissapointed... I thought your journal was supposed to be actually deleted after 30 days of being "deleted"... oh well, at least I can laugh at how silly I am.
Weeelll then i say... stop looking for life and it will find you!
it looks to me that posting your sched. on here is the thing to do. Being the trend follower i am i have decied to do so myself.

im going to bemidji for spanish camp for 28 days... i'll be back july 20th, giving me plenty of tiem to attend the korn tour with no name. (that is on the 27th)I will come back speaking more mexican that most people in the school. 'Cept for maybe the madhack spanish 5 people. i'll probably be in spanish 5 next year

Here we have a third occurrence of the inevitable.  One of the few things that mattered much to me... gone. To a different host...

*chorus of needles - soad*
TO kill that guy... I WILL! THAT WILL BE MY OCCUPATION!!!

Today my parents are making them go christmas shopping for them... And that doesn't mean tthat im going to buy stuff for people that they were too lazy to buy stuff for. It means that they are making me buy stuff for them. This would be similar to me going to school, walking up to some kid that's smaller than me and saying, "Your going to bo buy stuff for me, with your money, and you are gonna like it!". Oh well, I don't have any positive reasons to hold onto my money. And as soon as i finish that, I can go see Lord of the Rigns with what money i have left. 

Grr... They need a larger variety of christmas songs...
INVADER ZIM will be on TV tomorrow. I need to find the halloween episode for download....

Though my views have been heavily athiestic, I think I will try to get the best of both(more than that, but keeping it simple) options. My little cousin Mattie, has lukemia... After she was diagnosed with it, she began her treatment. This involved first drilling holes in a couple of her bones for some reason, also it involved standard cancer treatment. Just recently, she was taken off of her treatment, because of the level of red blood cells (maybe it was white) in her blood was way to low. So right now, she is probably getting sicker, because of a weakened immune system, while her cancer goes untreated...

I ask God to help her.

It wasn't my fault. The same thing that happened last time again occurred... That is annoying, but there isn't much i can do about it, but live with it for the rest of highschool. 

At least this time I sensed it happening... I wasn't sure at the time...

Not that it will matter as much this time... The standards of the admired are much higher than the requirements of the seeker meet... I know it wont happen... All the same;; The thought of it still exists, even though physically, it wont "happen"

People need to communicate better (part of my brain is screaming hypocrite), especially to your "friends"... No, I won't be your friend. You know who you are kid. Sheesh.... can't even spell his middle name right... You are blind to feel as you do... not that you were blind in the past partainging to other events...  the "admired" presents a certain disgust... just go...

At least now I can view my cynical actions towards her as somewhat justified...

I guess that is just what you get...

Whoops, i just realised what I did... I destroyed it...
Ahh shit, not that it matters much... After all; the only real value of anything is based on another thing... If you know your math, that generally means that everything is worthless... I know that it is overrated to go around thinking that, but when it makes you feel better, it's ok.
I have decided that im not going to take up more db space until i start paying for this. That involes getting a job.... so , either im getting a job soon, or you wont hear from me on here for a while

I want everyone to forget me. Unless they are friends with me for the hell of it. Most people are firends because of some sort of status.... "Do you like ____ band"   "Do you love me"  "Are you ____"   so on....   if people cant handle my answers to some of these questions, then they shouldnt be associated with me anyway. Freindship isn't based off of status, it should be based off of simpler things, such as if you think the other person is funny, ect. 

Things related to this that are the devil:
Status
Society

well... being as though my parents dont even let me own a lighter, the fact that you were playing around with one... no two right in front of my mom wasn't that cool... she is prolly gonna rage on me

heh... yola and kt brought lighters over to my house today.

Well, im not actually un-grounded, but I can do whatever I want today because tomorrow it my birthday.
Right now I am half dead because I just woke up, so I cant really remember anything I id over the period of time I have been grounded thus far... If I did anything at all.
So im just gonna talk about the tour.
Kent, Kristina, Ben, and I decided to meet at the ampi-ghetto
I took bens bus to his house, where I met his insane dog, Dakota. I helped him do some yard work so his dad would take us... And after we were done we went on the computer, and graeme confirmed that the rumor that the concert was moved up to 6 PM was true. So, we had to get a new way of getting there, we messaged Kent, who was at Kristinas house. We told him of the tour starting time, and Kristina obtained her dads car for transportation. Brian Pickle and Sean Segarson also came to bens house, and sense Kristina didn't know the way, she followed the black jeep, that Brain and Segarson and (t)Fucker where in. The instatnt we got to a highway there was a traffic jam.... skipping some parts, we got to the concert 40 minutes late, we missed nO ONe and most of Head charge. When Rammstien stared playing ben and I jumped into the floor. In the First song he was playing, he had a black coat on and he had this cyclops  laser eye thing... then he set himself on fire... rammstien had a lot of stuff to do with fire, in this one song, he had a flamethrower on he mouth, an the keyboardist had a squirtgun on his mouth. and they started shooting at each other.  
Then System of a Down Played... they kicked ass... They played these songs...
Jet Pilot
Prison Song
Needles
X
Chop Suey
Toxicity
Sugar
Everyone was singing along with chop suey.... it was the coolest sounding thing ever.
Then Slipknot played a lot of good songs and had a drum solo, that was the sweetest, the platform that the drummer was on lifted up and started rotating sideways... is was coolio.
IM NOT GROUNDED FROM THE PHONE ANYMORE so call me. Im bored.
